text: This chapter shall be so interpreted and construed as to effectuate its general purpose to make uniform the law of the District of Columbia with the law of those states which enact the Uniform Common Trust Fund Act.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 26-304.

1973 Ed., § 26-704.

Uniform Law

This section is based upon § 3 of the Uniform Common Trust Fund Act. See Volume 7, Part II Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on WESTLAW.

DC CODE § 26-404

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Banks and Other Financial Institutions. (Refs & Annos)
